amendment.purpose: An amendment to require a report to Congress from the President detailing statutory or regulatory barriers which prevent the use of technologies under the bill as well as a report identifying impacts of water diversions in the San Joaquin Valley and recommended steps to mitigate such impacts.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gordon (TN) amendment (A013) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to by House: On agreeing to the Gordon (TN) amendment (A013) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Gordon (TN) amendment (A013) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A013) offered by Mr. Gordon (TN).
